comment: Mother of pearl is this hot.  Burns your taste buds off. Add water and you get corn sweetness and classic bourbon notes.  Not my style.
A burning river of Kentucky in my glass.
Strong caramel nose, taste Caramel, spices & a nice hug going down
Very good, warming, not hot. Lots of oak and wood, vanilla, cinnamon, roasted walnuts, pecans, aroma of kraft caramels
